me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.api.teams

Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.donkeycore.minigamemanager.api.teams.Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a group of players that are working together in a minigame

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Team.Builder
      Builder class to generate teams
